693330.name: Fake World VR
693330.description:
A simple shooter with weird controls; fight through levels filled with shape monsters to discover the Fake World's true origins.

Built for VR
  • Fake World utilizes the HTC Vive's hardware to create a completely unique gaming experience
  • Fake World brings innovative new movement systems to the VR scene; you have never played anything like Fake World

Movement and Combat
  • Move freely through levels in zero gravity by throwing your move sphere and absorbing its velocity
  • After a few levels unlock and experience a transformative new teleportation mechanic
  • Fight through hoards of enemies
  • Dodge and shoot down enemy bullets to survive

Throw your ball to move in it's direction
